dmca.title: Zango Zings C&D at ZingoZango.com
dmca.body:
CONFIDENTIAL - FOR SETTLEMENT PURPOSES ONLY

Dear [private],

We write concerning your registration of the domain name zingozango.com (the "Domain Name"). The website at the Domain Name provides a variety of links to goods and services, including software which removes software produced by Zango Technologies, LLC ("Zango").

Zango provides a widely known and popular website at www.zango.com, and is a leading provider of games, downloadable software, screensavers, video and many more goods and services. Zango adopted its corporate name and ZANGO trademark in 2003 and, since that time, has actively used the ZANGO name and trademark in connection with its online business. Zango owns United States trademark registrations and applications for the ZANGO trademark in multiple classes of goods and services, as well as international registrations in a variety of other related trademarks.

Zango has made a substantial investment in developing and providing its good and services. As a result of Zango's efforts and its devotion of substantial effort and resources to provide high quality services, the ZANGO name and trademarks are widely known among the consuming public worldwide, and the name and trademarks embody substantial and valuable goodwill.

The Domain Name contains the ZANGO mark in addition to a non-distinctive term. Your use of the Domain Name in association with a product which
